effect.en: Your opponent's Single Strike Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more.
effect.fr: Les attaques des Pokémon Poing Final de votre adversaire coûtent Colorless de plus.
effect.es: Los ataques de los Pokémon Golpe Brusco de tu rival cuestan Colorless más.
effect.it: Il costo degli attacchi dei Pokémon Colpo Singolo del tuo avversario aumenta di Colorless.
effect.de: Die Kosten der Attacken der Fokussierter-Angriff-Pokémon deines Gegners erhöhen sich um Colorless.

description.en: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
